message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price of $15000. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not sure I can meet you halfway. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $13000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $13000 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider $11000?
I understand you're trying to stretch your budget, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $11000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $13000 and $11000, so how about we try $12000?
I'm getting close to walking away, but I'm still willing to negotiate. How about we meet at $11500?
I'm not quite there yet, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $12200, which is the lowest I'm willing to go. Let me know if that's acceptable to you.
